/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, mostly in shades of gray and white, are adorned with red and green accents, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the scene. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape.
